summary: MY AIRBAG RECALL CAME TO ME TODAY 7/18/2017 - I FOUND OUT ABOUT THIS RECALL FROM FACEBOOK BACK IN SEPT. 2016 - I CALLED LEXUS WAS INFORMED TO DRIVE THE CAR OVER - I SIGNED A PAPER STATING I WAS NOT ALLOWED TO DRIVE MY CAR AND IT MUST SIT IN MY GARAGE FOR AS LONG AS THERE IS NO PART TO REPLACE IT WITH - THEY GAVE ME A LOANER CAR BUT AFTER 10 MONTHS LATER AND MY CAR DEAD - THE PART CAME IN - IT WAS LIKE PULLING TEETH TO GET THEM TO EVEN LOOK AT THE CAR AND DID NOT WANT TO EVEN PUT IN A NEW BATTERY - AFTER COMPLAINING AND WORKING WITH THE HOME OFFICE THEY DID A COMPLETE ONCE OVER AND A NEW BATTERY - MY CAR IS WORKING NOW - BUT - LEXUS SHOULD HAVE DONE SOMETHING FOR THEIR CUSTOMERS - LAWYERS ALL OVER THE PLACE WANT TO HELP YOU GET YOUR MONEY BACK - LEXUS DIDN'T EVEN WANT TO HEAR ABOUT ANY ISSUES YOU HAD - COMPLAINTS ETC..... YOU WOULD THINK THEY WOULD WANT TO ASSIST YOU WITH MORE ITEMS TO REPLACE ON YOUR CAR - 10 MONTHS OF WAITING?????? CRAZY !!!!!!
